description:
Don't keep score for games with a physical pencil and paper. Do it virtually!

* Keep score for any points-based game, such as Dominoes, Uno, Rummy, etc.
* Even use it to keep track of virtual winnings for games like Poker and Blackjack
* Set up a game by defining its details, such as types of bonuses, limiting the number of rounds, allowing negative totals, and goal (highest or lowest score wins)
* Add any number of players/teams as you want
* Change the name of a player/team at any time
* Tap the pencil icon to enter a score and user-defined bonuses; totals will be adjusted accordingly
* Tap an entered score at any time to view the details or make changes; totals will be adjusted accordingly
* Always see a running total for the rounds played at the bottom of the screen
* Instant notification via icon of who is winning the game as the game is being played
* When the game is over, the winner is displayed as well as the ranking for each player/team

Release Notes:
1.3.0: You can now save game details and players!
1.2.0: Added "Extra Player Information" when creating a new game. This allows you to enter player-specific information for each round, such as Tricks.
1.1.0: Added option to show the score and bonus details for each player/round. Added additional fonts.
